title: Day 12: All of Megan Nick's Shades
description:
Aerial skier Megan Nick stops by In The Village wearing only one of her 15 sunglasses to discuss speed markers, her start as a gymnast and to recommend the duck tacos, she thinks.

Follow In The Village on Spotify or an inside look at the athlete life in Beijing, and watch all the Olympic action unfold on the networks of NBC.
author: tess.quinlan@nbcuni.com (NBC Olympics)
